MainBanner.title1:
Transforming Spaces
with Exceptional Natural Stone.
MainBanner.description1: Marbléo Natural Stone is an innovative marble supplier known for outstanding quality and distinctive designs. Our portfolio exceeds 40 product lines with over 500 material references.
MainBanner.title2:
Elevate Your Project
with Timeless Elegance.
MainBanner.description2: From classic to modern, our curated natural stone collection brings unique beauty and durability to every design. Explore our catalog and find the perfect match for your vision.

InfoSection.subtitle: PRODUCT GROUPS
InfoSection.heading: Top Picks in Natural Stone
InfoSection.description: We deliver durable and aesthetic solutions tailored to your projects.

product1.title: Travertine Blocks
product1.description: Large-size blocks selected at the quarry with consistent texture and color; ideal yield for fabrication and high-volume projects.

product2.title: Travertine Slabs
product2.description: 2, 3, 5 cm thicknesses with polished, honed or brushed finishes; calibrated, reinforced, and ideal for bookmatch use.

product3.title: Travertine Tiles
product3.description: Standard sizes such as 30×60, 60×60, 60×120; precise edges for fast, clean installation in interior and exterior spaces.

product4.title: Travertine Special Designs
product4.description: Custom waterjet cuts, mosaic combinations, CNC carving and 3D panels; tailored to project details and delivered turnkey.

quality.title: Superior Quality
quality.description: Quarry-selected blocks and rigorous QC for consistent color/texture and long service life.

design.title: Distinctive Designs
design.description: Project-specific aesthetics with waterjet, mosaic and book-match applications.

range.title: Wide Material Range
range.description: 500+ material references and strong inventory for on-time supply and continuity.

custom.title: Customization Options
custom.description: CNC processing, bespoke sizes and surface finishes tailored to your project.

sustain.title: Sustainable Sourcing
sustain.description: Responsible quarrying and waste reduction to minimize environmental impact.

expert.title: Expert Guidance
expert.description: End-to-end support with technical surveys, samples and application advice.

item1.title: We Combine Passion for Natural Beauty with a Commitment to Quality
item1.description: Thanks to our global partners, we quickly adapt to projects of different scales and technical needs—from hotel chains to palaces and mosques—always on time and to spec.
item1.alt: Modern interior designed with natural stone surfaces

item2.title: From Quarry to Project: Traceable, Timely and Reliable
item2.description: Block selection, slab preparation, calibration & reinforcement, project cutting… Tight tolerances and consistent surfaces shorten on-site installation times.
item2.alt: Visual showing quarry and slab processing

item3.title: Custom Cuts and Surface Finishes for Your Design
item3.description: Waterjet mosaics, CNC carving and 3D panels—delivered with dimensional accuracy, ready for installation. A flawless fit for luxury hospitality and residential projects.
item3.alt: Natural stone with waterjet and mosaic details

block.title: Wholesale Travertine Blocks from Turkey – Direct Quarry Supplier
block.intro: Majen supplies wholesale travertine blocks from Turkey directly from our Uşak – Ulubey quarry. With Blaundos Antiko, Light, and Ivory varieties, our blocks are recognized worldwide for consistent texture, durability, and large export-ready dimensions. For wholesalers and importers seeking wholesale travertine blocks from Turkey, Majen ensures competitive pricing, stable supply, and trusted logistics support.
block.title2: Why Choose Wholesale Travertine Blocks from Turkey?
block.intro2: Turkey is the global leader in travertine exports, and Majen delivers premium wholesale travertine blocks from Turkey to international markets including the USA, Europe, and the Middle East. Our quarry-direct sourcing guarantees A-grade quality and strict quality control. By choosing wholesale travertine blocks from Turkey, buyers gain access to sustainable production, competitive FOB/CIF pricing, and reliable delivery schedules.
description: Our travertine blocks are carefully selected to ensure consistent texture and color. High cutting yield provides cost and time advantages for large-scale projects.
Export and domestic shipments follow proper packing and marking standards. The entire process is traceable and quality-controlled.

TextSection.text1: Blocks extracted from our Uşak – Ulubey quarry are ideal for factories and wholesalers. Available in Blaundos Antiko, Blaundos Light, and Blaundos Ivory, our blocks deliver consistent texture and large sizes for further processing and global shipment.
TextSection.text2: Premium travertine slabs in 2 cm, 3 cm, and 5 cm thickness with polished, honed, brushed, or tumbled finishes. Designed for both interior and exterior applications in residential and commercial projects.
TextSection.text3: Durable tiles available in 30×60, 60×60, and 40×80 cm. Ideal for bathrooms, kitchens, patios, and pool areas, with high slip-resistance options.
TextSection.text4: Bespoke solutions including steps, mosaics, borders, and unique architectural cuts crafted for villas, hotels, and signature projects.
TextSection.subtext1: Average block size is 280×220×200 cm with natural surfaces. Export-ready, suitable for bulk orders, with reinforced packaging for container loading.
TextSection.subtext2: Countertops, wall cladding, flooring, and exterior façades where durability and natural elegance are required.
TextSection.subtext3: Polished, honed, tumbled, and brushed surfaces to match diverse design requirements and performance needs.
TextSection.subtext4: Custom designs elevate aesthetics and provide exclusive solutions while preserving travertine’s natural durability and texture.

slabs.title: Travertine Slabs - Wholesale Travertine Slabs From Turkey
slabs.intro: 2 cm / 3 cm / 5 cm thickness, polished/honed/brushed options; ideal for bookmatch.
slabs.title2: Travertine Slabs - Wholesale Travertine From Turkey
slabs.intro2: 2 cm / 3 cm / 5 cm thickness, polished/honed/brushed options; ideal for bookmatch.
description: Slabs are prepared in 2 cm and 3 cm thickness, then calibrated, reinforced and finished for on-site readiness.
Outstanding surface quality and dimensional accuracy make them ideal for bookmatch and large-format installations, enabling fast and clean assembly.

With multiple surface options and durable properties, they adapt to different design concepts while reducing maintenance needs.

BlaundosIntro.title: In the Footsteps of Blaundos
BlaundosIntro.paragraph: We draw inspiration from the time-worn stones of the ancient city of Blaundos. With rich veining and natural tonal shifts, marble (travertine) brings timeless elegance to contemporary design, adding historical depth and lasting beauty to every space.

TravertinePage.title: Wholesale Travertine From Turkey – Direct Quarry Supplier in Uşak
TravertinePage.intro: Majen supplies premium travertine blocks, slabs, tiles, and custom designs directly from our quarry in Uşak – Ulubey, Turkey. As a trusted wholesale travertine supplier, we provide Blaundos Antiko, Blaundos Light, and Blaundos Ivory to international markets including the USA, Europe, and the Middle East. With consistent quality, competitive prices, and reliable logistics, Majen is your partner for wholesale travertine from Turkey.
TravertinePage.intro2: Turkey is the world’s leading exporter of travertine, known for its natural beauty, durability, and cost-effectiveness. At Majen, our Uşak – Ulubey quarry guarantees stable production, strict quality control, and sustainable practices. We combine local expertise with global standards, ensuring that architects, builders, and wholesalers receive top-grade travertine for projects worldwide. Choosing Turkish travertine means reliability, diversity, and unmatched value. That’s why Majen is your trusted source for wholesale travertine from Turkey.

cards.qualityText: High durability, natural beauty, and sustainably quarried travertine direct from Uşak – Ulubey. Majen is a trusted supplier of wholesale travertine from Turkey.
cards.applicationsText: Travertine blocks, slabs, tiles and travertine custom designns are ideal for flooring, wall cladding, pool decks, countertops, and bespoke architectural projects.
cards.sizesText: Standard block size 280×220×200 cm. Slabs in 2 cm, 3 cm, 5 cm, plus tiles in multiple formats such as 30×60 and 60×60 cm.
cards.finishesText: Available finishes: polished, honed, brushed, and tumbled. Custom surface treatments on request for wholesale travertine orders.

productCopy.block: Available color options: <links/>. Each reflects the quarry’s character and adds a strong, authentic presence to your project.
productCopy.slabs: This slab series offers: <links/>. With consistent surfaces and curated veining, it delivers a flawless look in large areas.
productCopy.tiles: In-stock colors: <links/>. Ideal for both indoor and outdoor tile installations with durability and refined aesthetics.
productCopy.special: For bespoke concepts, available colors: <links/>. We produce custom sizes and forms to achieve truly unique results.
